review: There's no way to turn it off except by unplugging it. That is pretty dumb designing, if you ask me. The design is okay, otherwise, so I have no complaints. I have learned of the many other complaints that other people have had, and I can't help, because I haven't experienced those. Generally, things work very well, and I'm pleased with it.

review: Was very impressed with speed of menu. Side loaded XBMC and it runs flawless. Had raspberry PI and it was sluggish but the fire tv flies. Brought on sale for 87.00 and could not be happier.
author: dave

review: I bought this device with the hope that it would provide a better user interface to/for Slingbox. It doesn't. Roku3 presents a virtual remote control of the being used at the host Slingbox. FireTv prevents a disjointed, poorly conceived & thoughtout, array of various icons.  Sure hopes it get better.  Once again the customer is presented with alpha- instead of prod. quality software.
author: Bill Boy

review: I've had the fire TV for a little over 2 months now. It works pretty good except for during playback the screen will go to static and say that the device cannot play the file right now. This happens on Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime so I know it's not the stream from the provider. I also have a fire tv stick that plays just fine.It gets annoying having to pick up the remote every 15-20 min to click play again during a movie.

review: Love it!! Great with Amazon Prime!
author: Pattie Alliston

review: From my initial impressions, it is locked down to essentially use just amazon services.  From my reading online, if you try to reprogram it (root it), amazon has a built in fuse that will essentially cause it self destruct if amazon figures out that you have hacked it.  That is ridiculous for a product that I paid real money for.  I could understand if amazon still owned it and was letting me use it for free, but I paid for it and therefore it is mine to use as I wish.  I wish I could return this device as I don't see myself using it, but I received it as a gift and don't have the receipt.I received a $100 paperweight for Christmass
